Control Name: REL 1.2 Manage service quotas across accounts and regions
Control Statement: If you are using multiple AWS accounts or AWS Regions, ensure that you request the appropriate quotas in all environments in which your production workloads run.

control_attributes.Control: REL 1.2 Manage service quotas across accounts and regions
control_attributes.Subcategory: How do you manage service quotas and constraints?
